banner.title: DAO unifying your events cross dApps
banner.subtitle: Decentralized event management
banner.description: Protocol on-boarding dApps to unify users calendars in one protocol, owned and controlled by DAO. Starting by our own products, we have a calendar centered dApp to connect with creators, educators, artists, therapists, lawyers, lecturers and much more.

about.title: In your control, secured by the community
about.subtitle: Decentralizing 1 calendar at a time
about.description: Protocol on-boarding dApps to unify users calendars in one protocol, owned and controlled by DAO. Starting by our own products, we have a calendar centered dApp to connect with creators, educators, artists, therapists, lawyers, lecturers and much more.

cards.title: Personal calendar
cards.description: Imagine using your personal calendar in multiple applications without any hazzle.

cards.title: Many dApps, 1 calendar
cards.description: Imagine Konecta Webapp, a Web3 GCal, DSCVR and your favorite dApps, all with your events, they are everywhere.

cards.title: Secured by the community
cards.description: Your data is safe. Konecta DAO, the one you belong to, will be the gatekeeper that control and protect your data.

prefooter.title: Getting started
prefooter.subtitle: Start your Konecta journey
prefooter.description: Learn everything you need to know, from beginner to master.
